name: Desert Robots
description:
rewinds, the connection to the robot will be lost, making him use his last valid Inputs, to progress in the Level. Stone Golems will try to stop you, kill them, to rob there time and proceede in the level.

Controls: WASD & Mouse to Move, left Ctr to sprint, left Mouse Button to shoot

Good Luck and have fun wit this small dumb game-jam game.
